title: DHS Responds to ACLJ: We’re Just Following Biden’s Orders
itunes:title: DHS Responds to ACLJ: We’re Just Following Biden’s Orders
description: The ACLJ sent a letter to Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas, Biden's Secretary for the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) regarding Executive Order 14076, the so-called "Protecting Access to Reproductive Healthcare Services" which as we explained in detail, poses a significant legal threat to Pregnancy Resource centers across the nation. The DHS just responded to our letter. Jay, Jordan, and the Sekulow team break down the reason for our concern and what the DHS had to say in their response. In the second half of the show we discuss Biden's surprise speech last night. This and more today on Sekulow.

The DHS just responded to our letter. Jay, Jordan, and the Sekulow team break down the reason for our concern and what the DHS had to say in their response. In the second half of the show we discuss Biden's surprise speech last night. This and more today on Sekulow.
